projects.title: Flutter E-Commerce App
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce mobile application built with Flutter, featuring product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment integration.

projects.title: iOS Fitness Tracker
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking iOS app that helps users monitor their workouts, set goals, and track progress using HealthKit integration.

projects.title: Flutter Weather App
projects.description: A beautiful weather application built with Flutter that provides real-time weather updates, forecasts, and location-based weather information.

projects.title: iOS Social Media App
projects.description: A social media platform built for iOS with features like post sharing, user profiles, direct messaging, and real-time notifications.
